parameter-group.name: oauth
parameter-group.label: Nest API OAuth
parameter-group.description: The OAuth parameters used when communicating with the Nest API

parameter.name: productId
parameter.label: Product ID
parameter.description: The product ID from the Nest product page

parameter.name: productSecret
parameter.label: Product Secret
parameter.description: The product secret from the Nest product page

parameter.name: pincode
parameter.label: Pincode
parameter.description: The single use pincode for obtaining an OAuth access token. Get the pincode by accepting to the terms shown at the product authorization URL. This value is automatically reset when the access token has been obtained

parameter.name: accessToken
parameter.label: Access Token
parameter.description: The access token used for authenticating to the Nest API. It is automatically obtained from Nest when the value is empty and a valid pincode parameter is entered
